description: The Irish government is to commemorate police forces who worked in Ireland before partition.
title: Varadkar 'stands over' Irish police commemoration
title_page: Varadkar 'stands over' Irish police commemoration - BBC News
maintext: The justice minister added that intolerance had forced many Irish people "to deny their own family histories and airbrush parents, grandparents and siblings out of the picture for doing no more than serving as an army officer or police officer to support their families".
